#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
 ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
 long long int t,k,c1,c2,c3,c4,c5,c6,i;
 cin>>t;
 while(t--)
 {
 char exp[100];
 cin>>exp;
 k=strlen(exp);
 c1=0,c2=0,c3=0,c4=0,c5=0,c6=0;
 for(i=0;i<k;i++)
 {
 if(exp[i]=='(')
 {
 c1++;
 }
 else if(exp[i]=='{')
 {
 c2++;
 }
 else if(exp[i]=='[')
 {
 c3++;
 }
 else if(exp[i]==')')
 {
 c4++;
 }
 else if(exp[i]=='}')
 {
 c5++;
 }
 else if(exp[i]==']')
 {
 c6++;
 }
 if(c4>c1||c5>c2||c6>c3)
    break;
 }
 if(c1==c4&&c2==c5&&c3==c6)
 {
 cout<<"yes"<<endl;
 }
 else
 {
 cout<<"no"<<endl;
 }
 }
 return 0;
 }
